acumen:package:build.description: Builds a standard SFDX source format package file from the specified org's existing metadata.
examples:
$ sfdx acumen:package:build -o options/package-options.json -x manifest/package-acu.xml -u myOrgAlias
    Builds a SFDX package file (./manifest/package.xml) which contains all the metadata from the myOrgAlias.
    The options defined (options/package-options.json) are honored when building the package.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

package.name: package
package.description: The path to the package file to be generated. By default the path is 'package.xml'

metadata.name: metadata
metadata.description: A comma separated list of metadata to include. This list overrides any exclude list in the options file.

options.name: options
options.description: A file containing the package build options. Specifying this option will create the file if it doesn't exist already.

namespaces.name: namespaces
namespaces.description: A comma separated list of namespaces to include when retrieveing metadata. By default namespaces are excluded.

acumen:package:merge.description: Merges one SFDX package file into another.
examples:
$ sfdx acumen:package:merge -s manifest/package.xml -d manifest/package-sprint17.xml
    Merges package.xml into package-sprint17.xml

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

source.name: source
source.description: The source SFDX package. This package wins all conflict battles!

destination.name: destination
destination.description: The destination SFDX package which contains the merge results. It will be created if it does not exist.

acumen:package:permissions.description: Retrieve all metadata related to Profile security/access permissions.
examples:
$ sfdx acumen:package:permissions -u myOrgAlias
    Creates a package file (package-permissions.xml) which contains
    Profile & PermissionSet metadata related to ApexClass, ApexPage, CustomApplication, CustomObject, CustomTab, PermissionSet, Profile permissions.

$ sfdx acumen:package:permissions -u myOrgAlias -m CustomObject,CustomApplication
    Creates a package file (package-permissions.xml) which contains
    Profile & PermissionSet metadata related to CustomObject & CustomApplication permissions.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

package.name: package
package.description: The path to the package file to be generated. By default the path is 'package-permissions.xml'

metadata.name: metadata
metadata.description: A comma separated list of the metadata types to include. This overrides the default list: ApexClass, ApexPage, CustomApplication, CustomObject, CustomTab, PermissionSet, Profile.

namespaces.name: namespaces
namespaces.description: A comma separated list of namespaces to include when retrieveing metadata. By default namespaces are excluded.

acumen:schema:dictionary.description: Generates a DataDictionary-[Org].xlsx file from an Org's Object & Field metadata.
examples:
$ sfdx acumen:schema:dictionary -u myOrgAlias
    Generates a DataDictionary-myOrgAlias.xlsx file from an Org's configured Object & Field metadata.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

report.name: report
report.description: The path for the data dictionary report XLSX file. This overrides the default: DataDictionary-{ORG}.xlsx.

namespaces.name: namespaces
namespaces.description: A comma separated list of namespaces to include when retrieveing metadata. By default namespaces are excluded.

options.name: options
options.description: A file containing the Data Dictionary options. Specifying this option will create the file if it doesn't exist already.

acumen:source:permissions.description:
Generate a security report based on configured permissions.
The accuracy of this report is dependant on the configuration in the local project.
It is suggested that a permissions package be created using the acumen:package:permissions
command and that package is retrieved from the org prior to executing this command.
examples:
$ sfdx acumen:source:permissions -d security/report -u myOrgAlias
    Reads security information from source-formatted configuration files (**/objects/*/*.object-meta.xml, **/objects/*/fields/*.field-meta.xml, **/permissionsets/*.permissionset-meta.xml, **/profiles/*.profile-meta.xml) located in 'force-app' and writes the 'PermissionsReport.xlsx' report file.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

source.name: source
source.description: The source folder to start the meta scan from. The default is 'force-app'.

report.name: report
report.description: The path for the permissions report XLSX file. This overrides the default: PermissionsReport.xlsx.

folders.name: folders
folders.description: A comma separated list of folders to include. This list overrides the defaults: **/objects/*/*.object-meta.xml, **/objects/*/fields/*.field-meta.xml, **/permissionsets/*.permissionset-meta.xml, **/profiles/*.profile-meta.xml.

acumen:source:xpath.description: Validates XML against xpath selects and known bad values.
examples:
$ sfdx acumen:source:xpath -o ./xpathOptions.json"
    Validates the project source from the x-path rules specified in 'xpath-options.json'

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

options.name: options
options.description: A file containing the XPathOptions json. Specifying this option will create the file if it doesn't exist already.

acumen:apex:coverage:clear.description: Clears the Apex Code Coverage data from the specified Org.
examples:
$ sfdx acumen:apex:coverage:clear -u myOrgAlias
    Deletes the existing instances of ApexCodeCoverageAggregate,ApexCodeCoverage from the specific Org.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

metadatas.name: metadatas
metadatas.description: An optional comma separated list of metadata to include. The defaults are: (ApexCodeCoverageAggregate,ApexCodeCoverage.)

wait.name: wait
wait.description: The maximum wait time (minutes) for test execution to complete. A value of -1 means infinite wait. This flag is ignored if Apex Test execution is skipped.

acumen:source:delta:git.description: Uses a git-diff file to detect deltas. Generate a git-diff.txt diff file as follows: git --no-pager diff --name-status --no-renames -w <target branch> > git-diff.txt
examples:
$ sfdx acumen:source:delta:git -g git.txt -s force-app -d deploy
    Reads the specified -(g)it diff file 'git.txt' and uses it to identify the deltas in
    -(s)ource 'force-app' and copies them to -(d)estination 'deploy'

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

git.name: git
git.description: The output of a git-diff command (https://git-scm.com/docs/git-diff)

source.name: source
source.description: The source folder to start the delta scan from.

destination.name: destination
destination.description: The destination folder for the deltas.

force.name: force
force.description: Path to a file containing folders & files to include in the delta destination. Will override md5/git AND ignore file contents.

ignore.name: ignore
ignore.description: Path to a file containing folders & files to ignore. Will override md5/git file contents.

deletereport.name: deletereport
deletereport.description: Path to a file to write deleted files.

check.name: check
check.description: Does a dry-run of a deployment. Inspect the log file for results. NOTE: This option is ignored if no (d)estination option is provided.

acumen:source:delta:md5.description: Uses an MD5 hash file to detect deltas.
examples:
$ sfdx acumen:source:delta:md5 -m md5.txt -s force-app -d deploy
    Reads the specified -(m)d5 file 'md5.txt' and uses it to identify the deltas in
    -(s)ource 'force-app' and copies them to -(d)estination 'deploy'

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

md5.name: md5
md5.description: The MD5 hash list file to use

source.name: source
source.description: The source folder to start the delta scan from.

destination.name: destination
destination.description: The destination folder for the deltas.

force.name: force
force.description: Path to a file containing folders & files to include in the delta destination. Will override md5/git AND ignore file contents.

ignore.name: ignore
ignore.description: Path to a file containing folders & files to ignore. Will override md5/git file contents.

deletereport.name: deletereport
deletereport.description: Path to a file to write deleted files.

check.name: check
check.description: Does a dry-run of a deployment. Inspect the log file for results. NOTE: This option is ignored if no (d)estination option is provided.
